title: Plugins
brief:
Staff are users who into either of 2 types.
First, persons who are directly into your organization's payroll, commonly called Employees.
Second, persons are contracted to function in your organization and payment for his/her services is done thru a vendor company, we'll call this Vendor Contractor.

title: Templates
brief: Imagine a chair or a hat to be filled by a staff, this is Job Position. Main reason to this is to ensure minimal changes to processes and workflows when staff change positions.

icon: <svg width="24" height="24" class="size-6 stroke-gray-400" viewBox="-1.5 0 32 32" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" fill="#000000"><g id="SVGRepo_bgCarrier" stroke-width="0"></g><g id="SVGRepo_tracerCarrier" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></g><g id="SVGRepo_iconCarrier"> <g id="icomoon-ignore"> </g> <style type="text/css"> .st0{fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:2;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:10;} .st1{fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:2;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:10;} </style> <rect x="4" y="4" class="st0" width="10" height="10"></rect> <rect x="4" y="18" class="st0" width="10" height="10"></rect> <rect x="18" y="4" class="st0" width="10" height="10"></rect> <line class="st0" x1="23" y1="19" x2="23" y2="27"></line> <line class="st0" x1="19" y1="23" x2="27" y2="23"></line> </g></svg>
title: Applications
brief: This is an organizational role associated to a job position to perform its associated responsibility. Can be either a single job position, or a group of position/title having the same responsibility.
